Scourge looks at Rage
Scourge: That was an explosion. For your safety you shouhld come with me.

Rampage, that there is no way to complete his first objective point his gun 
at the controls for the flyinhg island and fires
Rampage: All predacon units still on the osland evacuate imediately

Tankorr: TANKORR HAVE PROBLEM!!!!!!
he almost looses his balance fully but is able to regain it quickly. He 
repositions his hands that he is now grabbing Carnage. He then spins around 
and throws her. then he transformers to tank mode and heads towards the edge 
of the island i jump off.

Inferno turns around and heads back to the predacon base

Scourge(to rage): Looks like we better go big fella. Follow me.
he heads off to the pred base
